about_the_game:
Adopt a more menacing alien look: The Nocturne Pack adds a set of creepy alien skins, inspired by the map Derelict. The Onos, Fade, Gorge, Lerk and Skulk all receive the Nocturne treatment. Once purchased, Nocturne skins are available in the Customization screen.

Nocturne skins can be combined with those in other skin packs, including Kodiak, Shadow Fade, and Tundra. Mix and match different skin packs to create your perfect alien team look.
detailed_description:
Adopt a more menacing alien look: The Nocturne Pack adds a set of creepy alien skins, inspired by the map Derelict. The Onos, Fade, Gorge, Lerk and Skulk all receive the Nocturne treatment. Once purchased, Nocturne skins are available in the Customization screen.

Nocturne skins can be combined with those in other skin packs, including Kodiak, Shadow Fade, and Tundra. Mix and match different skin packs to create your perfect alien team look.
name: Natural Selection 2 - Nocturne Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows Vista 64-bit or newer
  • Processor:Core 2 Duo E6700 (2.66 GHz) or better
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:DirectX 9 compatible dedicated video card with 1 GB VRAM and support for Shader Model 3 (e.g. AMD X800, NVidia 8600 or better)
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:12 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *:Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor:Core 2 Quad Q9650 (3 GHz) or better
  • Memory:8 GB RAM
  • Graphics:DirectX 9 compatible dedicated video card with 1.5 - 2 GB VRAM (AMD 5770, NVidia GTX 450 or better)
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:12 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Adopt a more menacing alien look: The Nocturne Pack adds a set of creepy alien skins, inspired by the map Derelict. The Onos, Fade, Gorge, Lerk and Skulk all receive the Nocturne treatment.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Finnish, Romanian, Swedish, Czech
*languages with full audio support
